item.title: Report X-2025050665
item.description:
Report X-2025050665

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-06
  • City: Havre
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 08:30 MT - PPRX 171283 released half a cup of crude oil on shell body. No ground impact. Track 2330. Hazmat pool placed underneath car as a precaution. Contractor assistance needed to clean the car body. BNSF Hazmat responder - responded and identified the sample line valve was partially open and the plug was loose contributing to the release. The plug was secured and the valve was closed. Olympus Technical cleaned the car body so the car could continue in transportation.
